website_summaries.verdict: An energizing bodywash that moisturizes and cleanses without irritating skin.
pros: Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin
cons: Not the best if you're looking for a product that lathers easily

customer_reviews.title: Missing half my product
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, Cleans well. But I was disappointed when I opened the package to find that 1/3 of the bottle was spilled into the wrapper and all over the bottle itself. The push down cap was open when shipped. So unfortunately feel a little ripped off for the price. Whoever packaged it didn’t care too much and just threw it in open now I have a great smelling mess on my hands and bottle. Unhappy with this
customer_reviews.author: David Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Anthony products have gone down the tube
customer_reviews.text: Wrote to Customer Service and never received a reply. Posted a photo with a review here on Amazon and it was rejected - even though it did not violate any policy. So we're back to say we will never buy an Anthony product again. :) The product arrived not as advertised and it did not smell like this particular Anthony Hair and Body wash usually does.
customer_reviews.author: Mikel

customer_reviews.title: You and your shower will smell great!
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Reminds me of a Spa. Reason I took a star away was the bottle is huge (need to keep the cost per ounce down) and the spout is too short to get much of your hand or sponge under it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and the scent. But the price is a little bit up there. As the product is a Canadian made. But I will always order when I can work it in my budget.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P.

customer_reviews.title: Offensive, horrible smell!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what happnend to this product. I have being using it for last 2 years and was always happy. The last shipment I got has a different cap and smell is totally different and very unplesant. don't know if they changed the formula or just a defective batch. Returning and probably would not use again.
customer_reviews.author: OlgaV

customer_reviews.title: Pure luxury
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap/shampoo! It's so luxurious and refreshing. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: the best smelling body wash.
customer_reviews.text: Smells great all day without being overpowering. Absolutely love it. it could have be packaged better.
customer_reviews.author: J Kurt Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Worth It's Pricyness
customer_reviews.text: This is like man crack in the shower. Something about the smell. It should be a cologne.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Great smell. Like Badedas
customer_reviews.text: I love Badedas when I can find it. This stuff smells very similar (great) and I also use it on my head. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Hitdog042 Top Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years, and this bargain size is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Heintz

customer_reviews.title: Invigorating scent!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, just a little pricey for the size you get.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for a single use soap (hair and body). Smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: James K.

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is some of my all time favorite body wash. Great, refreshing smell.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Goolsby

customer_reviews.title: Great product very poor packaging and handling
customer_reviews.text: This product smells amazing and has plenty of projection however upon arrival half about a quarter of the contents was spilled in the box and the top of the container was completely broken.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Gallardo Junior

customer_reviews.title: The body wash itself is great, but $15 for less than 4oz when you ...
customer_reviews.text: The body wash itself is great, but $15 for less than 4oz when you can get 3x more for $26? C'mon, that's a ripoff
customer_reviews.author: MRJr

customer_reviews.title: Horrible shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Top not screwed on and body wash leaked all in box.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Martin

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, but...
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, and I enjoy using it -- especially as an occasional alternative to my other preferred body wash from Jack Black. But unlike the Jack Black, this one doesn't lather as well. And that's why I can only give it 4 stars. Still, the scent will wake you up in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Cory A. Sekine-Pettite

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this but unfortunately it does not lather that much ...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this but unfortunately it does not lather that much and it quickly leaves your skin so you don't feel necessarely as clean as you would think. It smells fantastic and that's why I bought it, and it feels great on the skin as well expect not for very long as I have previously indicated. If they could change the formula to make it lather more and stay on a little longer it would be with the high price, otherwise in my opinion it is over priced.
customer_reviews.author: JPL.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best mens body wash ive ever tried, great smell, great results.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It's ok but not for the $55 price tag! It was advertised in Men's Health for $15x
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this stuff. The larger bottle is great. Now he’ll be able to enjoy it for much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Yup

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product that invigorates your skin and has a great smell.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Men and Women
customer_reviews.text: My wife took this wash over. We both love it
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Prducts that start your day off with a GREAT feeling
customer_reviews.text: Anthoney products have always been outstanding, this is no exception. Stands on its own in using to get my Day going feeling fresh, and smelling outstanding for a man.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis DeMolet

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bodywash
customer_reviews.text: One of the best body washes I've used. I know its expensive, but it feels great on my skin in the shower, smells great and is therefore worth it to me to splurge on this. I may be buying only this from now on.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Best Body Wash Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best body wash i ever used. Great for normal skin types....doesn't dry or over-moisturize.....smells amazing....makes you feel fresh. I got my dad and brother using it as well and they love it just as much as i do.
customer_reviews.author: alexi walsh

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel and smell of this bath wash
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel and smell of this bath wash. Makes me feel like I am at a fancy spa every time I use it. Would recommend it for sure
customer_reviews.author: Frank Catone

customer_reviews.title: Definitely invigorating!
customer_reviews.text: Great scent, definitely invigorating. nice rich lather. Says it can be used as a shampoo but dried my hare but a great body wash.
customer_reviews.author: tpen007

customer_reviews.title: I was happy to find this item in this Lg sizes and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find this item in this Lg sizes and the price was good to say the lease.
customer_reviews.author: Pappa G

customer_reviews.title: I love this body wash
customer_reviews.text: I love this body wash, however I was little disappointed that it was leaking slightly when it arrived. It was packaged in plastic, so it didn't ruin anything else in the box. Bottle seems to be fine after I rinsed it off.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: It cleans well!
customer_reviews.text: A small amount of product is needed to lather the entire body. Smells great and cleans well. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael DeRiggi

product_meta.title: Anthony Invigorating Rush Hair and Body Wash, 32 Fl Oz, Contains Eucalyptus Extract, Canadian Balsam, Birch Leaf, 2-In-1 Formula For Hair and Body, That Cleanses, Refreshes, Hydrates and Soothes
product_meta.description:
Size:32 Fl OzAnthony Invigorating Rush Hair + Body Wash is essential in your daily routine of shower. Eucalyptus extract stimulates. Birch leaf refreshes. Canadian balsam soothes. Glycerin and Vitamin B5 provide lasting hydration. It will jump start your body and mind.

Suggested Use
Apply to wet hair and body. Work into a lather. Rinse off.
feature_bullets: Invigorating Rush Hair + Body Wash, Immerse yourself in a crisp, fresh Canadian Balsam forest every time you shower with our Invigorating Rush Hair + Body Wash. This award-winning, 2-in-1 formulation cleanses and conditions hair and body in one easy step.

Recharge the body and mind with this multitasking formula for hair and body. The unique alpine wood scent is clean and refreshing, promising an invigorating rush with every use — perfect for an early morning shower or soothing, post work-out clean.
How to Use: Apply to wet hair and body. Work into a lather. Rinse.
Key Ingredients: Eucalyptus extract stimulates. Birch leaf refreshes. Canadian balsam soothes. Glycerin and Vitamin B5 provide lasting hydration.
Claims: Free of parabens, phtalates, GMOs, DEA, and triclosan. Allergy and dermatologist tested. Made cruelty free in the USA.
